contentFull: Learn the processes that ensure the effective and efficient use of IT in enabling an organization to achieve its goals. ITProTV offers binge-worthy courses in Prince 2 and ISO/IEC.

courses.description: ISO/IEC 20000:2011 is the International Standard for IT service management. In this accredited show we explore the requirements for an organization to achieve the ISO/IEC 20000 certification. This show is designed as a 1st step for managers and internal auditors who are considering gaining accreditation for their organization and as an overview for IT staff who’s organization is working towards accreditation. This show will also prepare individuals for the ISO/IEC 20000 examination.
courses.descriptionMD: ISO/IEC 20000:2011 is the International Standard for IT service management. In this accredited show we explore the requirements for an organization to achieve the ISO/IEC 20000 certification. This show is designed as a 1st step for managers and internal auditors who are considering gaining accreditation for their organization and as an overview for IT staff who’s organization is working towards accreditation. This show will also prepare individuals for the ISO/IEC 20000 examination.
courses.name: Accredited ISO/IEC 20000:2011
courses.subtitle: Information technology - Service management

courses.description:
In this series we explore the concepts of Prince2® 2017 project management and prepare for the Axelos Prince2® 2017 Foundation examination accredited by PeopleCert.

We start with a downloadable introduction to the series.

courses.name: Prince2 2017 Foundation
courses.subtitle: Introductory certification to Prince2 2017 project managment
